message.body: Yayyy thank you! I'll let you know when it arrives!! :-) also I showed some of my friends the preview, and they agree that you're a genius!
Yay! Glad to hear your happy with them :-) and are getting me new clients ;) lol
Was it worth freezing your booty off?
Hahaha I would say it was...though if there's ever a next time I would bring more sources of warmth haha
Prob a good idea if you ever naked again in the snow..
